description: Global optimization refers to the process of finding the best solution from all feasible solutions in a given problem space. This is particularly challenging due to the presence of multiple local optima that can mislead optimization algorithms.
you_have_this_if: You are facing a complex problem with many variables.
Your current optimization methods are yielding suboptimal results.
You need to balance multiple objectives in your solution.
You are working in fields like engineering design or operations research.
You require a solution that adapts to changing problem parameters.
